SELECT SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BOARD_NUMBER, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REWARD, MEMBER_NUMBER) VALUES(#{boardNumber}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardReward}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE BOARD_NUMBER = #{boardNumber}

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER
